name: Barbed Tail
trigger_text: Once per round when you make a melee strike.
effect: You deal extra damage with the strike equal to your highest characteristic score.

name: Glowing Eyes
trigger_text: When you take damage from a creature.
effect: Deal that creature psychic damage equal to 1d10 + your level.

name: Draconian Guard
trigger_text: When you or an adjacent creature takes damage from a strike.
effect: Reduce the damage from the strike by an amount equal to your level.

name: Draconian Pride
story_text: You let loose a mighty roar to shake your foes’ spirits.

name: Dragon Breath
story_text: A furious exhalation of energy washes over your foes.
special_effect: You choose the damage type: acid, cold, corruption, fire, lightning, or poison.

name: Remember Your Oath
story_text:
Even should the sun stop in the sky
Even should the night last a thousand years
I will stand forever
I shall not yield
Those who suffer and yearn for justice
I am your sword and shield
I will yield no ground
I will speak no lies
I will stand against all tyrants
Until the last villain dies
effect: Until the start of your next turn, your saving throws succeed on a 4 or higher.

name: The Wode Defends
story_text: Thorny vines erupt from every surface and attempt to bind your foe.

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + M or A damage; A < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier2: 3 + M or A damage; A < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
tier_effects.tier3: 5 + M or A damage; A < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

name: Glamor of Terror
trigger_text: When you take damage from a creature.
effect: That creature becomes frightened of you until the end of their next turn.

name: Detect the Supernatural
effect: Until the end of your next turn, you know the location and nature of any supernatural object, undead, construct, or extraplanar creature within 5 squares, even without line of effect.

name: Resist the Unnatural
trigger_text: When you take damage that isn’t untyped.

name: Determination
effect: End one of the following conditions on yourself: frightened, slowed, or weakened.

name: Keeper of Order
trigger_text: Once per round when you or an adjacent creature makes a power roll.
effect: Remove an edge or a bane on the roll, or turn a double edge into an edge, or a double bane into a bane.

name: Relentless
trigger_text: Damage from a creature that leaves you dying.
effect: Make a free strike against any creature. If that creature is reduced to 0 Stamina by your strike, you can spend a Recovery.

name: Shadowmeld
effect:
You flatten yourself into a shadow against a wall or floor you are touching, and become hidden from any creature you have cover or concealment from or who isn’t observing you. While in shadow form, you have full awareness of your surroundings, and strikes made against you and tests made to search for you take a bane. You can’t move or be force moved, and you can’t take main actions or maneuvers except to exit this form or to direct creatures under your control, such as one you summon using an ability. Any ability or effect that targets more than 1 square affects you in this form only if it explicitly affects the surface you are flattened against. You can exit this form as a maneuver. 
If the surface you are flattened against is destroyed, this ability ends and you take 1d6 damage that can’t be reduced in any way.

name: Reactive Tumble
effect: Shift 1 square after the forced movement is resolved.

name: Vengeance Mark
effect: Place a magical sigil on a creature within 10 squares. You choose where it appears and whether it's visible to only you or to all. You always know the direction to any creature bearing your sigil on the same world. You can have a number of active sigils equal to your level. You may remove a sigil at will (no action). Placing a new sigil beyond the limit removes the oldest.

name: Detonate Sigil
story_text: A magic sigil you placed on a creature explodes with energy.
power_roll: Power Roll + Reason, Intuition, or Presence

tier_effects.tier1: 3 + R, I, or P damage; slide 1
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + R, I, or P damage; slide 2
tier_effects.tier3: 7 + R, I, or P damage; slide 3

effect: The sigil disappears from the creature.

name: Beyondsight
effect: Adjust your vision to allow you to see through mundane obstructions that are 1 square thick or less. While your vision is adjusted this way, you can’t see the area within 1 square of you and you don’t have line of effect to any creature or object in that area. You can restore your usual vision as a maneuver.

name: Foresight
effect: Impose a bane on the power roll.

name: Concussive Slam
story_text: You slam an invisible force down upon the target.
power_roll: Power Roll + Reason, Intuition, or Presence

tier_effects.tier2: 5 + R, I, or P damage; push 1
tier_effects.tier3: 7 + R, I, or P damage; push 2; M < STRONG; prone

name: Psionic Bolt
story_text: You shoot forth a purple beam of psychic force that moves your target.
power_roll: Power Roll + Reason, Intuition, or Presence

tier_effects.tier1: 2 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 1
tier_effects.tier2: 5 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 2
tier_effects.tier3: 7 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 3

name: Minor Acceleration
story_text: You fill yourself or an ally with a burst of speed.
effect: Target gains a bonus to speed equal to your Reason, Intuition, or Presence score (your choice) until the start of your next turn.
